CatDescriptText: A natural gas explosion may have blown out the back of a rowhouse and destroyed interiors of neighboring homes.  In the debris a bedroom can be seen on the second floor and a dining room of the first floor.  Spectators stand across the street behind the wooden barricade.
TitMainTitle: Women and men gathered across street from four severely damaged row houses with debris on sidewalk, possibly after gas explosion, possibly on Crawford Street, Hill District
